Package org.apache.mailet.base.mail

This package and its sub-packages extend and provide utilities for use with javax.mail, its sub-packages and its implementations.

AbstractDataContentHandler Abstract class providing common Data Handler behavior.

MimeMultipartReport Class MimeMultipartReport implements JavaMail support for a MIME type of MimeMultipart with a subtype of report.

Package org.apache.mailet.base.mail Description

This package and its sub-packages extend and provide utilities for use with javax.mail, its sub-packages and its implementations.

The intent is to mirror the related package structures where possible. So, org.apache.utils.mail is a mirror of javax.mail and org.apache.utils.mail.handlers is a mirror of com.sun.mail.handlers.
